phrases.original: You are invited to join us for
phrases.translated: You are invited to join us for

phrases.original: Please inquire below for location details and directions.
phrases.translated: Please inquire below for location details and directions.

phrases.original: Hi {RECIPIENT-NAME}, it's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I invited you {INVITED-DATE} to Bible Talk. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi {RECIPIENT-NAME}, it's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I invited you {INVITED-DATE} to Bible Talk. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: Hi! It's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I'm glad that I could invite you to Bible Talk. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi! It's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I'm glad that I could invite you to Bible Talk. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: Hi again! I'm glad that I could invite you to Bible Talk. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi again! I'm glad that I could invite you to Bible Talk. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: Hi {RECIPIENT-NAME}, it's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I invited you {INVITED-DATE} to church. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi {RECIPIENT-NAME}, it's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I invited you {INVITED-DATE} to church. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.translated: Hi! It's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I'm glad that I could invite you to church. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: Hi again! I'm glad that I could invite you to church. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi again! I'm glad that I could invite you to church. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: Hi {RECIPIENT-NAME}, it's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I invited you {INVITED-DATE} to {EVENT-TITLE}. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi {RECIPIENT-NAME}, it's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I invited you {INVITED-DATE} to {EVENT-TITLE}. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: Hi! It's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I'm glad that I could invite you to {EVENT-TITLE}. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.
phrases.translated: Hi! It's {SENDER-FIRST-NAME}. I'm glad that I could invite you to {EVENT-TITLE}. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.translated: Hi again! I'm glad that I could invite you to {EVENT-TITLE}. I'm looking forward to joining you there {EVENT-START-DATE} at {EVENT-START-TIME}.

phrases.original: If you can join, I recommend adding it to your calendar (above) to help you remember.
phrases.translated: If you can join, I recommend adding it to your calendar (above) to help you remember.

phrases.original: I hope to see you there!
phrases.translated: I hope to see you there!

phrases.original: If you can't attend in person (e.g. for health or safety reasons), you can attend virtually.
phrases.translated: If you can't attend in person (e.g. for health or safety reasons), you can attend virtually.

phrases.original: If you have any questions, or to RSVP, please reach out below:
phrases.translated: If you have any questions, or to RSVP, please reach out below:

phrases.original: If you have any questions or feedback, please inquire below.  Also, don't forget to ask about the location of the meeting!
phrases.translated: If you have any questions or feedback, please inquire below.  Also, don't forget to ask about the location of the meeting!

phrases.original: If you plan on attending, please RSVP (below) so that we can expect you.
phrases.translated: If you plan on attending, please RSVP (below) so that we can expect you.

phrases.original: If you are traveling in person, you may also want to call a second time just before you leave, to confirm that everything is still on schedule and that there have been no last-minute changes.
phrases.translated: If you are traveling in person, you may also want to call a second time just before you leave, to confirm that everything is still on schedule and that there have been no last-minute changes.
